meanings.definition: Not having been investigated or examined
meanings.sent1: The unprobed mystery left everyone curious.
meanings.sent2: The unprobed document contained hidden secrets.
meanings.sent3: The unprobed room seemed to hold endless surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her unprobed thoughts were like a locked chest.
meanings.sent5: The unprobed forest was full of unknown creatures.

meanings.definition: Not having been explored or delved into
meanings.sent1: The unprobed cave was a mystery waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent2: The unprobed territory held untold treasures.
meanings.sent3: The unprobed idea sparked curiosity among the group.
meanings.sent4: His unprobed emotions were like a deep ocean.
meanings.sent5: The unprobed depths of the ocean held ancient secrets.
